com.opengamma.strata.product.credit.type

Interface CdsConvention

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Named, TradeConvention
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ImmutableCdsConvention

    public interface CdsConvention
extends TradeConvention, Named
    A market convention for credit default swap (CDS) trades.

    This defines the market convention for CDS trades in different regions and currencies.

    To manually create a convention, see ImmutableCdsConvention. To register a specific convention, see CdsConvention.ini.

      • extendedEnum

        static ExtendedEnum<CdsConvention> extendedEnum()
        Gets the extended enum helper.

        This helper allows instances of the convention to be looked up. It also provides the complete set of available instances.

      • getStepInDays

        int getStepInDays()
        Gets the number of step-in days.

        This is the date from which the issuer is deemed to be on risk.

        Returns:
        the number of step-in days

      • getSettleLagDays

        int getSettleLagDays()
        Gets the settlement lag in days.

        This is the number of days after the start date that any upfront fees are paid.

        Returns:
        the settlement lag in days

      • toTrade

        CdsTrade toTrade(LocalDate startDate,
                 LocalDate endDate,
                 BuySell buySell,
                 double notional,
                 double coupon,
                 ReferenceInformation referenceInformation,
                 double upfrontFeeAmount,
                 LocalDate upfrontFeePaymentDate)
        Creates a CDS from the convention.

        A single name CDS can be specified using SingleNameReferenceInformation. An index CDS can be specified using IndexReferenceInformation.

        Parameters:
        startDate - the date that the CDS starts
        endDate - the date that the CDS ends
        buySell - whether protection is being bought or sold
        notional - the notional amount
        coupon - the coupon amount
        referenceInformation - the reference information of the CDS
        upfrontFeeAmount - the amount of the upfront fee
        upfrontFeePaymentDate - the payment date of the upfront fee
        Returns:
        the CDS trade

      • calculateUnadjustedMaturityDateFromValuationDate

        default LocalDate calculateUnadjustedMaturityDateFromValuationDate(LocalDate valuationDate,
                                                                   Period period)
        Used in curve point calculation.
        Parameters:
        valuationDate - the date of the curve calibration
        period - the term for this point
        Returns:
        unadjusted maturity date

      • calculateUnadjustedMaturityDate

        static LocalDate calculateUnadjustedMaturityDate(LocalDate valuationDate,
                                                 Frequency paymentFrequency,
                                                 Period period)
        Gets the unadjusted maturity date.

        Standard maturity dates are unadjusted, always Mar/Jun/Sep/Dec 20th. For example, from February 2009 the 1y standard CDS contract would protect the buyer until 20 March 2010.

        Parameters:
        valuationDate - the valuation date
        paymentFrequency - the payment frequency
        period - the term for this point
        Returns:
        unadjusted accrual maturity date
